div.p: M77/7745, unit 982, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

See also M to W. Odgers, 11 July 1877.
These documents had been kept in the Gov. Printing Office as authority for the binding and distribution of these volumes. A copy of this correspondence has now been prepared for Mr Ferres, and the originals are returned herewith in accordance with the Undersecretarys request of the 4th August.
Letter not found, but see M to W. Odgers, 11 July 1877 (in this edition as 77-07-11a).

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
